pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 君は彼女の忠告に従って行動すべきだったのにしなかった。
lessons.english: You should have acted on her advice.

lessons.japanese: 君は彼の忠告を尊重せねばならない。
lessons.english: You must pay attention to his advice.

lessons.japanese: 君は彼の忠告を受け入れるべきだったのに。
lessons.english: You should have accepted his advice.

lessons.japanese: 君は彼の忠告に従ったほうがよい。
lessons.english: You may as well follow his advice.

lessons.japanese: 君は医者の忠告に従うべきだ。
lessons.english: You should follow the doctor's advice.

lessons.japanese: 君は医者に忠告を求めたほうがよい。
lessons.english: You had better ask the doctor for advice.

lessons.japanese: 君はボブの忠告に従おうとはしない。
lessons.english: You will not take Bob's advice.

lessons.japanese: 君はお父さんの忠告を聞けばよかったのだ。
lessons.english: You ought to have taken your father's advice.

lessons.japanese: 君はお父さんの忠告を聞くべきである。
lessons.english: You ought to take your father's advice.

lessons.japanese: 君はお父さんの忠告に従った方がよい。
lessons.english: You may as well follow your father's advice.

lessons.japanese: ご忠告に従って行動します。
君の忠告に従ってさえいればなあ。
lessons.english: If only I had taken your advice.

lessons.japanese: 君の忠告がなければ、私は途方にくれるだろう。
lessons.english: If it were not for your advice, I would be at a loss.

lessons.japanese: 君の忠告がなかったら鞄を盗まれるところだった。
lessons.english: Without your advice, I would have been robbed of my bag.
